events.title: Premier League: Man United vs Man. City
Monsters University
events.description: A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University -- when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

events.title: Zootopia
events.description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

events.title: WALL-E
events.description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

events.title: Inside Out
events.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

events.title: Finding Nemo
events.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

events.title: Brave
events.description: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

events.title: Monsters, Inc.
events.description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.

events.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
events.description: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

events.title: Up
events.description: Seventy-eight year old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his home equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

events.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
events.description: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

events.title: Finding Dory
events.description: The friendly but forgetful blue tang fish begins a search for her long-lost parents, and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

events.title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
events.description: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

events.title: Cars 2
events.description: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

events.title: Robots
events.description: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

events.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
events.description: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

events.title: Cars
events.description: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

events.title: Ice Age
events.description: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

events.title: Escape from Hell S1, E1
events.description: Bear Grylls re-lives the experiences of survivors who have managed to survive in different environments and tells their stories.

events.title: Mythbusters S16, E1
events.description: A weekly documentary in which two Hollywood special effects experts attempt to debunk urban legends by directly testing them.

events.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
events.description: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

events.title: The Shawshank Redemption
events.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

events.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
events.description: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

events.title: Lord of War
events.description: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an Interpol agent.

events.title: Gladiator
events.description: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

events.title: Pride & Prejudice
events.description: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

events.title: The Green Mile
events.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

events.title: Kill Bill: Volume 1
events.description: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

events.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
events.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

events.title: Iron Man 2
events.description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

events.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
events.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

events.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
events.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

events.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
events.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

events.title: Iron Man 3
events.description: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

events.title: Repo Men
events.description: Set in the near future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, it revolves around a man who struggles to make the payments on a heart he has purchased. He must therefore go on the run before said ticker is repossessed.

events.title: Iron Man
events.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

events.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
events.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle Earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

events.title: Yes Man
events.description: A guy challenges himself to say "yes" to everything for an entire year.

events.title: Kill Bill: Volume 2
events.description: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.
